ISSUE.TITLE: Product duplication when "IncludeProductsFromSubCategories" setting is active
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 Steps to reproduce the problem: 1. Enable CatalogSettings.IncludeProductsFromSubCategories (Admin -> Configuration -> Settings -> CatalogSettings -> Include products from subcategories) 2. Go to a category with subcategories and products 3. Add any product in subcategory to root category ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/37818094/107007957-42538780-67a4-11eb-9b53-c47d32720647.png)

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5320 Fix product duplication when "IncludeProductsFromSubCategories" setting is active
